entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -15.6°C
Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
